1.question: When is nimiq going Proof of stake ?
1.answer: There is no official date for Nimiq 2.0!

2.question: Will nimiq continue to use mining with Proof Of stake?
2.answer: No, Nimiq will go full proof of stake(PoS) after that you will not be able to mine anymore!

3.question: Can i mine on a phone?
3.answer: Yes that is possible, BUT Don't do it! it will give you almost no reward and is bad for your phone.

4.question: Should i mine with my laptop?
4.answer: IF your laptop has really good cooling you could mine on it. But overall we do not recommend it.

5.question: Should i mine with only CPU?
5.answer: No, we do not reccoment anyone to do CPU mining only the rewards are low.

6.question: Can i mine with GPU?
6.answer: Yes, GPU and FPGA are most efficient right now! mining on CPU will probably cost you money.

7.question: What is the easiest miner to use?
7.answer: https://hub.shortnim.me/setupMiner This is a easy and fast wat to setup a gpu/cpu miner for new users

8.question: What mining pools are available?
8.answer: An easy to use interface for pools can be found here: https://hub.shortnim.me and if you want to see all pools: https://miningpoolstats.stream/nimiq Remember try to mine on lower hashrate pools to secure the network!

9.question: How much will i earn by mining?
9.answer: You can calculate your mining reward with the following calculator: https://calc.nimiqx.com/`
